## Properties

| Property         | Attribute        | Description            | Type                                           | Default                  |
| ---------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| `classification` | `classification` | Heading classification | `"mono" \| "sans-serif" \| "serif"`            | `HEADING_CLASSIFICATION` |
| `size`           | `size`           | Heading  size          | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| "xxl"`   | `HEADING_SIZE`           |
| `tag`            | `tag`            | Overwrite Tag          | `string`                                       | `null`                   |
| `weight`         | `weight`         | Heading weight         | `"bold" \| "light" \| "regular" \| "semibold"` | `HEADING_WEIGHT`         |
